devdoc.details: Contract manager transaction of real estate

acceptTransaction(uint256).details: Allow only representative of seller call Seller will receive the deposit amount and set state to SIGNED

buyerCancelTransaction(uint256).details: Only transactions are subject to change (can modify state of transaction) if transaction not signed => refund deposit amount to buyers if transaction signed => buyer lost the deposit price

cancelTransaction(uint256).details: Only transactions are subject to change (can modify state of transaction) if transaction not signed => refund deposit amount to buyers if transaction signed and sellers call => send compensation for buyers

confirmTransaction(uint256).details: Seller confirm transaction recive remaining amount of transaction and transfer ownership of certificate to buyer

createTransaction(address[],uint256,uint.details: Buyer create transaction and send deposit amount to contract address

payment(uint256).details: Only representative of buyer (buyer[0]) buyer send remaining amount of transction to contract address (same sign transfer contract)

sellerCancelTransaction(uint256).details: Only transactions are subject to change (can modify state of transaction) if transaction not signed => refund deposit amount to buyers if transaction signed => seller send compensation = 2 * deposit price to buyer

acceptTransaction(uint256).notice: Accept deposit (same signed the deposit contract)

createTransaction(address[],uint256,uint.notice: Create transaction (same send request deposit contract)
